Name: You Are A Bird
About the game: Your real arms become wings in You Are A Bird. Flap and angle your wings to gracefully soar through the sky in the most immersive bird flight experience. Stalk prey from above, extend your talons, and swoop in for the catch while exploring an inifinite world. Flap and angle your wings to fly naturally as a bird does. Bird flight simulation based on real bird flight mechanics and soaring flight physics. An infinite procedural world generated from a new seed every game. Hunt prey from the sky to survive. Much more to come!
